question: This bank launches 'YES GST' Program to assist MSMEs.
explanation: YES BANK launches 'YES GST' program for MSMEs (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises) under its MSME CSR. It organises more than 3,000 events on GST over the next 6 months in partnership with National Small Industries Corporation (NSIC), Federation of Indian Export Organizations (FIEO) and Federation of Automobile Dealers Associations (FADA).
